Title: The number of times in KHM limited that somehow played a card and I didn't realize what was going to...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: The number of times in KHM limited that somehow played a card and I didn't realize what was going to happen is so high. A saga was just played into my Vorinclex and we both just sat there for a beat. Also for some reason rune's can enchant lands?
